attributes.action: Propose Lewis Hamilton for a Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: It is important that the United Kingdom recognises sporting excellence, great achievement, and the contribution of minority individuals to this great kingdom.
attributes.background: Lewis Hamilton, having now become a 7 time Formula One world champion, is one of Great Britain’s finest ever sportsmen. As black man in a white dominated sport, the institutions of the United Kingdom should recognise his remarkable achievements.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
